Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and unique features, we believe its value exceeds $100. I am extending this opportunity to purchase it directly from us at a special introductory price of $125. This exclusive offer comes with a satisfaction guarantee, ensuring that if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
